text: 21:25 Aposel 15:29Ezɨ Kantrin Igharazibar Gumazamizir Iesusɨn gɨn zuiba, e akɨnafarir mamɨn uan nɨghnɨzim osirigha me bagha fomɨra anemada. Egha me mɨgɨa ghaze, ia marvir guabar ofa gamir asɨzibar aman markɨ. Egh ia uaghan asɨzir ghuziba itiba koma asɨzir me fɨragharim dafa mɨsozibar aman markɨ, egh uari isɨ dakuva arazir kurabar amuan markɨ.”
